name: PlayingCardAPI
body:
### Welcome to the iOS Playing Cards API.

Include Cards.h/m in your project, create a card and then get it's image or name.

If you'd like more, contributions are greatly appreciated. Email simonrobbie@hotmail.com.

Enjoy!

Simon @simon-robbie

![Playing Cards Sample](https://github.com/simon-robbie/PlayingCardAPI/raw/master/Sample.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
